categoryRubrics.rule: Generally, the identifiers found within a CDA document should be unique and non-reoccurring within the same document.
EffectiveDate/Time elements have the right time and timezone offsets
EffectiveDate/Times for all historical activities should be within the lifespan on the patient
The Display Names used by the structured data should match the Display Name (Preferred Name) within the Terminology

<code xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" code="29308-4" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="ENCOUNTER DIAGNOSIS" xsi:type="CE"/>

categoryRubrics.description: Each of the code systems, value sets specified by the C-CDA IG refers back to standard terminologies like SNOMED-CT, LOINC, RxNorm, ICD9, ICD10. When codes from these codesystems are used to represent structured data the display name corresponding to the code should be used as part of the document

categoryRubrics.rule: Each entry has to be linked to related narrative text
All Template Ids should be Valid with correct extension value
A document with an encompassingEncounter AND encounter activities should reiterate the encompassing encounter in an encounter activity and the information must align
EffectiveDate/Time elements have the right time and timezone offsets
EffectiveDate/Times for all historical activities should be within the lifespan on the patient
The Display Names used by the structured data should match the Display Name (Preferred Name) within the Terminology

categoryRubrics.description: Each Immunization code should be validated aganist CVX Vaccines Administered valueset

categoryRubrics.rule: Each entry has to be linked to related narrative text

categoryRubrics.description: All Template Ids should be present with valid extension value

categoryRubrics.rule: EffectiveDate/Time elements have the right time and timezone offsets
EffectiveDate/Times for all historical activities should be within the lifespan on the patient
The Display Names used by the structured data should match the Display Name (Preferred Name) within the Terminology

issuesList.xmlString: <code xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" code="29762-2" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Social History"/>

categoryRubrics.description: Each of the code systems, value sets specified by the C-CDA IG refers back to standard terminologies like SNOMED-CT, LOINC, RxNorm, ICD9, ICD10. When codes from these codesystems are used to represent structured data the display name corresponding to the code should be used as part of the document

categoryRubrics.rule: Smoking status code value should be valid
Smoking status observation Template Id should be valid
Systems should capture birth sex independent of the Administrative Gender and encode them as an observation in the Social History Section

issuesList.xmlString:
SOCIAL HISTORY
Social History Observation Description Dates Observed
Gender Identity Asked but Unknown Unknown
Sexual Orientation Unknown Unknown
Smoking Status Heavy tobacco smoker May 1, 2005 - February 27, 2011
Current Smoking Status Current every day June 22, 2015
Basic Occupation Odd Jobs Day Worker June 22, 2015
Tribal Affiliation Coquille Indian Tribe June 22, 2015
Pregnancy Status Not Pregnant June 22, 2015
Sex Female N/A
Text description of the calculation

categoryRubrics.description: Systems should capture birth sex independent of the Administrative Gender and encode them as an observation in the Social History Section.

categoryRubrics.rule: Each entry has to be linked to related narrative text

referenceErrors.description: Consol US Realm Header SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget, where its type is Record Target (CONF:5266) each SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole, where  (CONF:5268) patientRole SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5280, R2.1=CONF:1198-5280)
Consol Allergy Observation2 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant, where its type is Participant (CONF:1098-7402)
Consol Note Activity SHALL contain  [1..*] author such that it  (3250-16913) Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)
